name: The night spoke our names
description:
A tiny game where you roll dice, use them to activate skills, and hope to survive the winter. You can press F to toggle fullscreen.

The game isn't super deep, but it's meant to be a bit challenging. You should be able to win every run if you use the mechanics wisely.

Originally made for GG22, then I took extra time for balancing and audio.

The game features a color palette by Poltergasm and music by Sara Garrard. The cover image is from the British Library archive. Inspired by Dicey Dungeons, The Yawhg, and other things.
